Description:
You have answered my question incorrectly, but you have endured my ordeal and therefore you will get my help.

Although I can't reward you properly, you can take some gold and rest for a while. I hope this serves as a lesson for the future and helps you in your quest.

I have to tell you that Lord Hanshek together with the princess arrived at the Ulminin obelisk two days ago. When they activated it, they awakened the dead and now the obelisk has a guardian, but I am convinced that you will defeat it.
DescriptionAction: It is not for me to tell you where they went, but if you cross the portal behind me, it will take you near the Ulminin Obelisk.
